entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support zstd Content-Encoding #50643
  • Perf regression: single_query #50639
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #50638
  • [Blazor] SSR security guidance docs #50637
    8.0
  • Clarify the names of the interactive render modes for Blazor and rationalize with the component tag helper #50636
  • Improve CodeCheck.ps1 experience for API changes during RCs #50635
    .NET 9 Planning
  • WebApplicationFactory disposes host before StopAsync on background service is called #50622

Closed

  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.Abstractions and Microsoft.AspNetCore.App marked as deprecated #50641
  • Synchronous operations are disallowed. Call WriteAsync or set AllowSynchronousIO to true instead with long html #50640
  • Security review for full stack web UI with Blazor #46396
    8.0-rc2
  • [Blazor] Startup APIs API review #49754
    8.0-rc2
  • [Blazor] Component application discovery APIs #49756
    8.0-rc2
  • API review: Razor MapRazorComponents #47312
    8.0-rc2
  • HttpRequestHeaders Keys.Contains is not case insensitive, whereas HttpDictionary is #50553
    9.0-preview1
  • InputFile in Blazor SSR #50614
  • CSS loading issue in Blazor Server app when Changing environment variable to "Production" #50595
  • Easy WASM and Web Component modules for Blazor Web #50615
  • API and Blazor template missing tags #49215
    8.0-rc2
  • Should this property be removed or marked as Obsolete? #50043
    8.0-rc2
  • Improve perf of forms by caching lambda expression compilation #50376
    8.0-rc2
  • NRE when binding to an array with SupplyParametersFromForm #49744
    8.0-rc2
  • [Blazor] Configure detailed errors for Razor component endpoints #49468
    8.0-rc2
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #50601
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #50611
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #50610
  • Perf improvement: json #50618
  • Perf regression: json #50619

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SDK version #50644
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix AwaitableSocketAsyncEventArgs reorderings on weaker memory models #50624
    area-networking

Merged

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Delay component activation until the initial page loads completely #50345
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Update Microsoft.IdentityModel to 7.0.0 #50632
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc2
  • Split redis output-cache pieces from Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchange.Redis into Microsoft.AspNetCore.OutputCaching.StackExchangeRedis #50457
    area-infrastructure, area-middleware, 8.0-rc2
  • Add helix-matrix.yml to checklist for updating major version #50633
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Update Blazor WebAssembly template #50554
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • [Blazor] Startup API cleanups #50571
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Update HttpHeaders Keys #50606
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Add release/8.0 to helix runs #50573
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Increment HubProtocol version for Stateful Reconnect #50442
    area-signalr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50608
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Fix incoming connections with same ID sometimes failing incorrectly #50417
    area-signalr
  • Fix dropping messages on reconnect #50409
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun
  • SignalR MessageBuffer fixes #50315
    area-signalr
  • WIP: Add automated Blazor WebView test using Photino #50347
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • Make enhanced nav much more conservative, and better handle redirections #50551
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Support injecting keyed services with `[Inject]` #50561
    area-blazor
  • Update Versions.props to latest Microsoft.Identity.Web 2.13.4 #50594
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Update Versions.props to latest Microsoft.Identity.Web #50582
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Dynamically toggle navigation interception #50564
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] APIs to preserve content between enhanced navigations #50437
    area-blazor
